title: Game making my computer freeze and getting punished for afk/leaving game?
body: So I've been having an issue where I'm in the loading screen and for some reason when I alt tab out, it sometimes freezes my computer. This never happened until this past week or 2 and I ended up getting a low priority que punishment twice because of this issue. There was another case where Time Warner Cable shut off their services in my area for a couple of hours because "they were running some tests" while i was in a game. Idk if I'm just really unlucky, but was just wondering if I can do something about this (getting punished for AFK/Leaving game when I didn't).

replies.body:
Wow that's pretty sucky to have your ISP shut off your internet while you're in a match >_<'

There's not a whole lot we can do about those penalties here on the boards, but we can try and help figure out why those loading screens are freezing on you to stop you from getting penalties in the future.

Sometimes if your network gets interrupted while on the loading screen, it can cause some really weird loading errors which cause the game to crash. Let's take a few minutes to update your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case something is a little off there. Test it in a practice match, and hit me back up if that doesn't help!
Nope happens to me all the time. What you can do to fix it sometimes is to ctrl+alt+delete and then just cancel out of the screen.
